definition: (old) rice vessel/black/old variant of 廬|庐[lu2]/(slang) (Tw) troublesome/fussy
surname Lu/abbr. for Luxembourg 盧森堡|卢森堡[Lu2 sen1 bao3]
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent

sentences.english: Rwanda is far from fully recovered.
sentences.chinese: 盧旺達離完全恢復還很遠。

sentences.english: Rwanda was in the throes of genocide.
sentences.chinese: 盧旺達陷於種族滅絕的陣痛。

sentences.english: Rwanda's support for the CNDP is fuelling much of the violence.
sentences.chinese: 盧旺達對CNDP的支持已經激起許多暴動。

sentences.english: I am somewhere in Rwanda when my car breaks down.
sentences.chinese: 當我的車出現故障的時候，我正在盧旺達某處。

sentences.english: Francoise Kanani is a nurse at a health center in Rwanda.
sentences.chinese: Francoise卡納尼是在盧旺達保健中心護士。

sentences.english: We stay out, and watch genocide engulf Rwanda.
sentences.chinese: 我們潔身自好，卻眼見種族滅絕吞沒盧旺達。
盧旺達，盧旺達非洲中東部一國家。
盧旺達，盧旺達非洲中東部一國家。

sentences.english: Yet culturally Rwandans don’t typically write books or stories.
sentences.chinese: 然而從文化上來說，盧旺達人通常不寫書。

sentences.english: The student finishes singing the Rwandan national anthem, and takes in the applause.
sentences.chinese: 學生們唱畢盧旺達國歌，教室裏響起熱烈地掌聲。

sentences.english: In Rwanda, the weather is always between 18 and 21 degrees C all year-round.
sentences.chinese: 在盧旺達，氣溫全年都在18到21攝氏度之間。

sentences.english: So what is Rwanda’s experience with P4P?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，盧旺達的P4P方案取得了哪些經驗？

sentences.english: End with a shared taxi ride to Kigali, Rwanda.
sentences.chinese: 最後可以共乘的士去盧旺達的基加利。

sentences.english: The island is one of the country’s newest self-improvement projects.
sentences.chinese: 伊瓦瓦島是盧旺達最新的自我提升項目之一。

sentences.english: To the former Belgian colonizers, Rwanda was a paradise.
sentences.chinese: 對於以前的比利時殖民者來說，盧旺達就是個天堂。

sentences.english: Nevertheless the accusations have cast a shadow over Kigali's reputation.
sentences.chinese: 然而，這些指控給盧旺達的形象投上一層陰影。

pinyin: A1 la1 bo2 Lian2 he2 Qiu2 zhang3 guo2
Sha1 wu1 di4 A1 la1 bo2
Bin1 xi1 fa3 ni2 ya4 zhou1

definition: Sumatra, one of the Indonesian islands
